basics.name: Karl Patrick Espiritu
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a passionate developer who has a deep interest in quality software and code, design patterns and best practices. I've been exposed in developing several software applications (both web and mobile) using LAMP Stack on the server-side and Javascript on the client-side for quite some time now. Just recently, I've been fascinated of how powerful Javascript can be and gradually changing my focus on developing my skills on full stack Javascript.  I love to be involved in projects that makes peoples live's a bit better. I also write plugins and contribute to the open source community on my spare time. Check out the geeky stuff I do aside from work - https://github.com/karlpatrickespiritu. I strongly believe in the saying: "There is no secret to success, just hard work".

work.summary: Helps develop and maintain company-owned web and mobile applications while writing maintainable software and following coding standards with different architectural design patterns. Uses the following web technologies on the daily basis:
highlights: Server Side - PHP (LAMP Stack), Company-built server-side (PHP) Architechture, NodeJs, Wordpress, API Integration.
Front-end - Gulp, LESS, Twitter Bootstap, Smarty, jQuery, AngularJs, different libraries and API Integration.
Mobile Application Development - AngularJs, Mobile Angular UI, Phonegap, Apache Cordova.

work.summary: I developed and maintained web applications for clients based foreign countries and have been assigned to several projects including healthcare, examination and reservation systems. I also talk to clients regularly to gather important project specifications, share project updates and to ensure that their project is on the right track.
